name: Sphero BOLT Coding Activities
description: Learn coding with Sphero BOLT programmable robot. Block-based and JavaScript coding lessons for middle school. LED matrix programming, sensors, and advanced robotics.

name: Sphero Mini Edu Elementary Coding
description: Introduction to coding for elementary students using Sphero Mini robot. Face-drive, block coding, and simple programming concepts through play-based learning.

name: Sphero RVR Robot Programming
description: Advanced robotics with Sphero RVR programmable robot. Python, JavaScript, Scratch, and sensor programming for high school. Build autonomous vehicles and custom projects.

name: Sphero SPRK+ STEAM Lessons
description: STEAM curriculum for middle school using Sphero SPRK+ robot. Cross-curricular activities integrating art, math, science, and coding.

name: Sphero Edu App - Beginner Activities
description: Free beginner coding activities in Sphero Edu app. Draw mode, block coding, and text coding progressions. No robot required for some activities.

name: Sphero Edu App - JavaScript Programming
description: Learn JavaScript programming through Sphero Edu app. Text-based coding for advanced students. Includes API documentation and project examples.

name: littleBits Electronic Building Kits for Kids
description: Magnetic electronic building blocks for K-8. Learn circuits, electronics, and invention through snap-together modules. STEAM activities and invention challenges.

name: littleBits Code Kit Programming
description: Learn coding and electronics together with littleBits Code Kit. Block-based programming for physical computing projects. Sensors, motors, and outputs.

name: Sphero Computer Science Foundations Course
description: Complete computer science curriculum for middle school. Sequencing, loops, functions, variables, and algorithms using Sphero robots. Standards-aligned lessons.

name: Sphero STEAM Lesson Library
description: Library of cross-curricular STEAM lessons using Sphero robots. Math, science, art, and social studies integration. Teacher guides and student worksheets.

name: Sphero Physics Lab Activities
description: Physics experiments using Sphero robots as data collection tools. Measure speed, acceleration, force, and angles. Graphing and data analysis.

name: Sphero Math Maze Activities
description: Mathematics practice through maze navigation. Geometry, measurement, angles, and problem-solving. Sphero robots navigate mathematical challenges.

name: Sphero Robotics Design Challenges
description: Engineering design challenges using Sphero robots. Build accessories, create games, solve real-world problems. Collaborative project-based learning.

name: Sphero Art and Animation Projects
description: Create art using Sphero robots. Light painting, drawing with robots, programmed art installations. STEAM integration of technology and creativity.

name: Sphero Storytelling and Narrative Coding
description: Create interactive stories by programming Sphero robots. Combine literacy, creativity, and coding. Character development and plot sequences.

name: Sphero Python Programming Course
description: Learn Python programming using Sphero RVR robot. Text-based coding for advanced students. Real-world programming applications and sensor integration.

name: Sphero Sensor Programming and Data Science
description: Advanced robotics using Sphero sensors. Collect environmental data, analyze trends, build data-driven applications. STEM integration.

name: Sphero Teacher Training and Certification
description: Free professional development for educators. Learn to integrate Sphero robots into curriculum. Best practices, classroom management, and lesson planning.

name: Sphero Classroom Setup and Implementation Guide
description: Resources for implementing Sphero robotics in classrooms. Device management, student grouping strategies, assessment tools, and troubleshooting.

name: Sphero Star Wars Droid Coding
description: Learn coding through Star Wars-themed activities. Program BB-8, R2-D2, and other Star Wars droids. Engaging introduction to robotics for all ages.

name: Sphero indi Early Learning Robot
description: Screen-free coding robot for early elementary. Color-based programming, problem-solving, and computational thinking without screens. Ages 4-7.

name: Sphero Global Challenge Competition
description: Annual robotics competition for students worldwide. Design challenges, coding competitions, and creative projects. Virtual and in-person events.

name: Sphero Community Projects and Sharing
description: Online community for sharing Sphero projects and programs. Learn from other educators and students. Collaborative coding and project galleries.

name: Sphero NGSS Science Curriculum
description: Next Generation Science Standards-aligned activities. Use Sphero robots to teach science concepts, conduct experiments, and collect data.

name: Sphero CSTA Computer Science Standards Pathway
description: CSTA standards-aligned computer science curriculum. Progressive learning pathway from K-12. Covers all CS concepts using Sphero robots.

name: Sphero At-Home Learning Activities
description: Activities designed for home learning and parent engagement. No teacher required. Self-guided lessons for families learning together.

name: Sphero Parent and Educator Resources
description: Guides for parents and educators new to robotics. Setup instructions, activity ideas, troubleshooting, and learning progression recommendations.

name: Sphero Accessible Coding Features
description: Accessibility features in Sphero robots and apps. Voice commands, screen readers, switch control, and adaptive programming for students with disabilities.

name: Sphero Multilingual Learning Resources
description: Sphero Edu app and resources available in multiple languages. Global accessibility for non-English speaking students and international classrooms.
